parameters.text: The options in this page can potentially break the system or disrupt the service.
Unless you know what you're doing, you have been WARNED!
WARNING: You cannot remove any record from this list once it has been added.

Technical note: The reason for this is to preserve parent reference records (this) as to not orphan any child records (participation records) that rely on the unique ID each record is referencing. Please see the main cloud server for further clarification. DELETING reference (parent) records will result in null references. -DiegoÂ²
If you have added a record by mistake, kindly 'Modify' the record instead.
'Archiving' a record means it will not show up as a selectable item for users.

parameters.ConfirmMessage: Yes set this as the current school year.
parameters.Message: WILL THIS SET THE ENTIRE SYSTEM TO THE SELECTED SCHOOL YEAR!

parameters.text: Please add a new school year.
